thread.title: Another EastEnders exit ahead as Shirley Carter makes a big decision? | Metro News
thread.title_full: Another EastEnders exit ahead as Shirley Carter makes a big decision? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Another EastEnders exit ahead as Shirley Carter makes a big decision? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Monday 20 Feb 2017 11:59 pm (Picture: BBC) 
EastEnders could be lining up another Walford exit as Shirley Carter decides that it’s time for her ailing mum to go back into a care home. But will Tina agree with her belief that Sylvie needs a higher level of care? And will Shirley even listen as she struggles to cope with managing Sylvie’s behaviour? 
Tina and Shirley have been jointly trying to care for Sylvie but Shirley has always found it a challenge. And when Tina makes a shocking discovery about how Shirley has been coping, the pair are forced to have a frank discussion. 
As Shirley tells Tina that they need to put Sylvie back into care for everyone’s sakes, Tina is naturally unsure – but Shirley is determined that things can’t go on as they are. (Picture: BBC) 
It remains to be seen whether EastEnders viewers will be saying goodbye to Sylvie but with the Carter family already struggling to get by under the weight of so many problems, it seems likely that Shirley will not take no for an answer this time. 
One to watch: Tuesday 28th February at 7:30pm on BBC One. Metro Blogs is a place for opinions. These opinions belong to the author and are not necessarily shared by Metro. More
